lessonGuidance: The pattern pictured is known as the Hole 1
First by looking at the bottom 1 we can guarantee a mine in one of the yellow tiles
Looking at the top one it borders both yellow tiles meaning that its mine is already accounted for and the three tiles above it can all be cleared.

instructions: Using the information about the pattern you just learned, Clear each tile that you know 100% is not a mine going from top left to bottom right of the board. Click the "Next" button at the bottom right of your screen when you are done.
